## Query.findByIdAndDelete() method

Removes the document with the id and returnes the deleted document. if the document is not present `undefined` will be returned

**Signature:**

```typescript
findByIdAndDelete(id: IDBValidKey, options?: QueryFindByIdAndDeleteOptions): this;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

IDBValidKey


</td><td>

Valid search key to find a document


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

QueryFindByIdAndDeleteOptions


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
const deletedDoc = await query.findByIdAndDelete(id, options);
```
